fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At day, Send someone an offer to join the Mafia.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- They may Accept or Reject the proposition, if they reject nothing will happen.
- Targets who accept will permanently gain the Mafia goal, Get access to Mafia chat and Translate their role name to Italian.
- You may only have 2 alive converted targets at any given time.
